This is a custom listing for Raquel. Please do not purchase it unless that is you, thanks!

This is a custom listing for Judith -- please do not purchase it unless that is you, thanks!

name: A Cure for Scurvy
description: Arrrrrr, pass the lemons, ye salty dog! This colorway is bright (but not eye-searingly so), tart, and perfect for any project that could benefit from a little vitamin C. It is a semi-solid, kettle-dyed colorway that will knit up with a subtle variegation. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock You can see even more photos of this colorway here

name: Apiary

If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! name: Book of Hours
description: There is so much to discover in this skein of kettle dyed yarn. Layer upon layer of deep greens, lush purples, gorgeous blues, and lovely yellows combine in a way reminiscent of an illuminated medieval Book of Hours. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! name: Boudicca
description: This gorgeous blending of turquoise and golden yellow is named after Roman Britain's warrior queen, Boudicca of the Iceni tribe. Something about the color's boldness and beauty demanded that she be its namesake. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! name: Bracken
description: In the autumn, the woods around New England explode into vibrant color. People are usually overawed by the foliage, but there is also beauty to be found closer to the ground. Our forest floors are covered in lovely, lush ferns and bracken, which take on a gorgeous golden glow. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Deep blue with a touch of green lurking below the surface, and little glints of gold here and there make this variegated colorway truly special. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. name: Money (self striping)
description: Dolla dolla bill, y'all. A self-striping sock yarn that is a gradated colorway. The skein has been split into two and dyed together to ensure maximum symmetry for your socks. This particular colorway gradates from dark to light from beginning to end -- there are no repeats. This colorway is currently only available on our Stevedore Sock yarn base. You can see even more photos here

name: Moss
description: Cool, springy moss was the inspiration for this semi-solid and subtly shaded colorway, which is comprised of multiple layers of green. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! name: Rosewood
description: The warmest tones permeate this lovely brown yarn, based on one of our all-time favorite knitting needle woods -- rosewood! This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock You can see even more photos of this colorway here

name: Rosewood (pale variation)
description: This is a lovely pale variation of one of our favorite colorways: Rosewood. But don't let the word pale fool you -- the tones in these skeins are rich and warm! This colorway is only available on our Dreadnought DK yarn base, and there are only two skeins available (they're a matching dye lot).

name: Sail Close to the Wind
description: This lovely variegated colorway was inspired by one of our favorite prints by artist Sally Harless, Sail Close to the Wind, and we thank her for her kind permission in allowing us to use her image in our listing. Two techniques are used to create this colorway. The skeins are kettle dyed to add the stormy grey and tonal teals of the ocean waves. The little hints of foxy orange, and the pink of the ship's flag are then hand painted. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock

name: Sailor's Delight
description: Red sky at night, sailor's delight. Red sky at morning, sailor take warning! This variegated colorway features all the colors of a sunset on the water -- reds (with a subtle hint of orange around the edges), yellows, turquoise, green. It's our best-selling colorway for good reason! This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock You can see even more photos of this colorway here

This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! name: Scrimshaw
description: If there's one thing sailors on whaling ships had plenty of, it was time and whale bone. With that time and those bones, the sailors created magnificent works of art called Scrimshaw. This speckled colorway is an attempt to capture some of that beauty. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock You can see even more photos of this colorway here

name: Seafoam
description: This kettle dyed colorway captures the delicate colors of the North Atlantic's breaking waves. It is a semi solid with a lovely, subtle tonality. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know! Please click on the yarn name for more information about the yarn base: Boatswain Bulky Clipper Ship DK Clipper Ship Sock Clipper Ship Worsted Danelaw DK Donegal Sock Dreadnought DK Schooner Sport Stevedore Sock You can see even more photos of this colorway here

name: Shackleton (self-striping)
description: There's something really special about a hand-dyed self-striping yarn. The Shackleton colorway (inspired by Ernest Shackleton's arctic expedition photos) consists of five bands of kettle dyed color, with no repeats -- with a gradation from pale ice grey to dark charcoal (almost black). The colors are sharply defined with little blending. A self-striping sock yarn that is a gradated colorway. The skein has been split into two and dyed together to ensure maximum symmetry. This colorway is currently only available on our Stevedore Sock yarn base. You can see even more photos of this colorway here

name: Shakespeare
description: Like a leather-bound folio of Shakespeare's works, this rich colorway invokes the warm and vibrant colors of The Bard's world: a rich red/brown, shot through with cool slate blue and warm golden tones. This colorway is available on all of our yarn bases. If one is out of stock, or you would like a larger dye lot than we have on hand, please let us know!
